channel.title: Built in walls
channel.description:
I couldn't think of an appropriate title for this, but let me explain my situation.
You know on the minimap if there is a wall it will just be like a white line on the minimap representing it, I want to add my own.
I'm making my own home area with a map editor, I got the bank area built in nice and neat, the hight settings are perfect, etc. I don't want to load objects for my walls, I want it to load.. how can i put it.. within the server. In other words.. I want this: [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/2169/96717898.png[/img] To look like this: [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/6126/50650505.png[/img] but not only that, have an actual like.. wall there that isn't an object so when u right click on it, it will act like it's just a part of the map.
I realized that these objects aren't added in via the map editor.. How can I add them?

item.title: Built in walls
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:5, topic:357506”][quote author=goldstylez link=topic=454018.msg3365082#msg3365082 date=1286715397]
is there a tut for map editor’s like this?
[/quote]Gravedig much?[/quote]

Why make another thread asking the same question when it can just be asked here

Read full topic

thats a direct dl from pbj.
i just played around with it, its awesome!

item.title: Built in walls
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

you must be using peter’s first map editor which could only do landscapes. I suggest you download his studio pre release and apply the bugfix to it. After that is done you can edit landscapes much easier and even add objects, any objects, walls, bank booths, you name it!

Read full topic
